entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
